resources.string: There is no sluice in this area.
The increase in the water flow is not noticeable. Person in charge of field operations carried out by the deputy commander of the area.
Happens if rain water led to an increase in water in the sluice, but this condition is not critical and dangerous yet.
Happens if rains caused widespread water discharge. Person in charge is Head of the Regional Disaster Management.
Happens within six hours if the water flow is not receding. Person in charge is the Governor.
Siaga Banjir (Jakarta Flood Alert) is an application that functions to monitor 14 sluicesâ€™ activities in Jakarta.
